Package src

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Main class that initializes program and provides static member variables for communicating with rating storage, library, and recommendations
    GUI
    Main GUI module, holds each of the three panels
    HistoryPanel
    JPanel to display user's rating history
    LibraryApplication
    Intermediary class (much like a facade) to handle communicating with the library.
    LibraryLogic
    Handles filtering and sorting of the library
    ListSearchLogic
    Contains methods for filtering movie lists
    MapBuilderLogic
    Makes maps of movies that share attributes (e.g.
    MapSearchLogic
    Provides methods for filtering movie maps
    Movie
    Encapsulates necessary information about movies
    MovieLibrary
    Stores static maps for each filter type that makes sense (full, date, director, parental rating, genre, actors, runtime).
    RatePanel
    Abstract class that each of the three panels extends.
    RateStorageApplication
    Intermediary class (much like a facade) that handles movie ratings and storing them
    RatingStorage
    Stores ratings of movies in two member variables, ratingLists (array of five lists of movies, one for each rating) and ratingMap (map with key as movie ID and value as rating associated with that movie)
    RecommendationApplication
    Intermediary class (much like a facade) to handle communicating with the recommendation logic
    RecommendationLogic
    Uses Apache Mahout to generate recommendations based on similarity of users.
    RecommendationPanel
    Panel for displaying recommended movies
    SearchPanel
    Panel for displaying filters, sorting, and its results
    SortLogic
    Sorts movie lists by Title, Critical Rating, Date, and Length
